1115748232724930566.text:
New feature! NFT Images. If you own an NFT, you can add it to your parcel, and to show that you, the owner of the parcel, also own that cool NFT, it'll get a special sparkley frame around it. The NFT is clickable to go to the OpenSea page.

List your best NFTs on your Parcel.pic.twitter.com/9jGawOj1uv

1121936535409000448.text: New features for power-users this week! See recently-added collections like @MegaCryptoPolis and @Blockcities on the homepage, auto-extend auctions that get last-minute bids, and add deals or "Buy Now" prices to your auctions.
